text: The Continental A-40 is an aircraft engine made by Continental Motors and is especially made for light aircraft. == Variants == ; A50 ; A50-1 ; A50-2 ; A50-3 ; A50-4 ; A50-5 ; A50-6 ; A50-7 == Users == * Aeronca KCA * Aeronca 50C * Aeronca 50TC * Aeronca S50C * Luscombe 8 * Piper J-3 * Piper J-4 * Porterfield CP50 * Porterfield CP55 * Taylorcraft BC * Taylorcraft BCS Category:Aircraft engines
title: Continental A-50
